Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Eliminates late fees for residential utility customers
Summary: Eliminates late fees for residential utility customers; provides that no late payment charges may be imposed on residential customers.
LawCode: Amd ยง42, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to eliminating late fees for residential utility customers
